feat.value: This Coptic apophthegm corresponds to the Greek apophthegm S 9 in Guy's edition. The corresponding Greek apophthegm does not appear in Migne's edition in the Patrologia Graeca vol. 65. Benedicta Ward gave the Greek version of this apophthegm #26 when she published her English translation Sayings of the Desert Fathers (1975)
